home.title: Asteraactive - Construction & Engineering Excellence
home.description: Leading construction and engineering company delivering innovative solutions
home.ogDescription: Building excellence through innovation and expertise

hero.title: We Build More Than Projects
hero.subtitle: At Asteraactive, we build trust, safety, and innovation.  Your partner for high-quality, integrated solutions in construction and electrical engineering.

about_home.title: Leading Construction & Electrical Engineering
about_home.paragraph1: Asteraactive was established to be a leading firm in electrical, mechanical, and construction fields. We strive to deliver integrated, high-quality solutions adhering to the highest safety and efficiency standards.
about_home.paragraph2: With a team of experienced engineers and technicians, we commit to executing projects accurately and on time. Our motto is quality, trust, and commitment.

services_home.title: Our Core Services
services_home.card1_desc: We handle all architectural and civil construction works for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
services_home.card2_desc: Design and implementation of all electrical systems, from interior lighting and power to infrastructure and MV works.
services_home.card3_desc: We provide complete maintenance for all engineering works, including electrical, mechanical, and civil systems.

benefits_home.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits_home.card1_desc: We adhere to the highest quality standards, from design to delivery, to ensure all desired outcomes are achieved.
benefits_home.card2_desc: We place great importance on applying health and safety standards on all work sites to ensure a safe, accident-free environment.
benefits_home.card3_desc: We are committed to delivering projects on time without delays, with accurate schedules and constant progress monitoring.
benefits_home.card4_desc: Our strength lies in our people. We have a specialized team of highly skilled engineers and technicians with continuous training.

cta_final.title: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
cta_final.subtitle: Let's build something great together. Contact us today to discuss your needs and get a consultation.

footer.about: Asteraactive is a leading firm in electrical and construction fields, delivering high-quality, integrated solutions with a commitment to quality, safety, and trust.
